title: Infinit. The last bridge of Sam.
description: In 2070, when the Earth is no longer. Sam, the main character, an orphan, mutated girl goes on a mission through the 7 Infinits to save the woman who raised her.On this incredible journey she meets a heartless guy named Fear, with whom she falls in love. They travel from one Infinit to another, meeting all 7 leaders. All together they must fight the dark forces to bring the Earth back to humans.The book informs its readers about cause and effect of some of our emotional behavior in a fun, engaging, and beautiful way as a SciFi Fairytale. Nova believes she has found a way to remind people about the simpler things we all tend to forget in our busy lives chasing our goals such as nature, family, freedom, truth, justice and honesty, friendship and love.
author: Mariia Nova
